roleset.name: let loose
roleset.note: UNLEASH-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls disassemble-23.3. (from unleash.01-v)

example.name: loose the dogs of war
example.text: Stung by the Giuliani ads, Mr. Dinkins's TV consultants, Robert Shrum and David Doak, finally unleashed a negative ad of their own.
example.arg: Mr. Dinkins's TV consultants, Robert Shrum and David Doak,
a negative ad of their own

example.name: passive
example.text: But ultimately he was undone by [forces]-1 unleashed *trace*-1 by his own comrade, Mr. Gorbachev.
example.arg: by his own comrade, Mr. Gorbachev
